author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: Export ofbiz.home.dir to external projects, so that they can
continue to either auto-detect the location of ofbiz, when built
separately, or do the right thing when called during a top-level ant

author: doogie
msg: OPTIMIZE: For all <subant> calls that need to deal with possible
extension compnonents, switch them over to a macro, <externalsubant>.
The reason for this will soon become apparent.

author: doogie
msg: OPTIMIZE: Make the targets clean and build use a common macro, so that
they both handle the case of hot-deploy/build.xml in the same way.

author: tucu
msg: YARN-883. Expose Fair Scheduler-specific queue metrics. (sandyr via tucu)

author: tucu
msg: YARN-883. Expose Fair Scheduler-specific queue metrics. (sandyr via tucu)
